AzureAd.Domain: Entra Id > Overview > Primary Domain, i.e. testperson.onmicrosoft.com
AzureAd.TenantId: Entra Id > Overview > Tenant ID, i.e. 5bff12c9-0f73-...etc.
AzureAd.ClientId: Entra Id > App Registrations > {your app} > Overview > Application (client) ID
AzureAd.ClientSecret: Generated when you create a secret in Entra Id > App Registrations > {your app} > Certs & Secrets > Client secrets > New Client Secret > Value
